Test Name: B-Cell Lymphoma, FISH (Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization), Tissue
Purpose: To detect genetic abnormalities associated with B-cell lymphoma for accurate diagnosis and patient management.
Container: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue block or positively charged slide
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, water bath, hybridization/incubation system, thermocycler, UV light source
